summary: Rose is a young girl who has been adopted by Draco and Hermione Granger. She is a brave and fierce witch, with an unquenchable curiosity and a heart full of love. Draco was initially wary of taking on the role of a father figure for Rose, but he soon found himself falling more and more in love with her. Though Draco is not her biological father, he is always willing to protect her and provide her with the love and comfort of a father. Rose loves Draco deeply, and often looks to him for guidance and support. Through their relationship, the two have formed a unique bond that is filled with love, laughter and tender kisses.

Draco is a protective and understanding father figure to his adopted daughter, Rose, and although he is afraid of his inability to provide for her, he loves her with all his heart. Hermione is a supportive partner, both emotionally and physically, and reassures Draco that Rose loves and respects him. Their relationship is strong, and although they have different parenting styles, their devotion to Rose is undeniable.
